snippet: The police officers were hospitalized after being found unconscious near an elevator in an apartment building in Coney Island, the police said.
abstract: Veteran New York City Police Officers Rosa Rodriguez and Dennis Guerra are both in critical condition after being overcome by smoke on 13th floor of high-rise housing development in Coney Island, Brooklyn; officers, found unconscious near elevator soon after blaze erupted, were assigned to area's public housing developments and had been in uniform and on regular patrol at time of fire.
lead_paragraph: The police officers were hospitalized after being found unconscious near an elevator in an apartment building in Coney Island, the police said.

headline.main: Two Officers Critically Injured While Responding to Brooklyn Blaze
headline.print_headline: 2 Officers Critically Injured Responding to Blaze in a Coney Island High-Rise
